changelog: Fixed schedule not updating - now properly saves and applies timer changes
Removed redundant 'Next newsletter' info from Actions tab
Fixed logs not auto-refreshing - now updates every 5 seconds when viewing
Fixed Update button - now properly downloads, builds, and restarts service
Added individual test connection buttons for Sonarr, Radarr, and Email in Configuration tab
Added email sender name field to customize 'From' display name
Added IMDB links for all movies, series, and episodes
Releases now sorted chronologically with day of week displayed
Notifications now persist longer (10 seconds instead of 5)
Logs now show last 200 lines instead of 100
Improved error handling and user feedback throughout
Updated UI colors to darker greyish theme for better contrast
